name: Grand Hotel
description: The Grand Hotel Deluxe Room offers a luxurious and comfortable stay with all modern amenities. Enjoy a spacious room with a king-sized bed, premium linens, and a beautiful view. The room includes a work desk, high-speed internet access, a flat-screen TV, and a minibar. The bathroom is equipped with a rain shower, plush towels, and high-quality toiletries to ensure a relaxing experience.

name: City View Inn
description: City View Inn offers a comfortable and affordable stay with essential amenities. This Non-Deluxe Room features a cozy double bed, clean linens, and a nice view. Guests can enjoy complimentary Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV, and a small work desk. The en-suite bathroom includes a standard shower, fresh towels, and basic toiletries to meet your needs during your stay.

name: Seaside Resort
description: Seaside Resort offers a luxurious and spacious Family Suite Deluxe for families. This suite includes two bedrooms, each with comfortable beds and premium linens, a living area with a sofa and flat-screen TV, and a dining table. The suite offers high-speed internet, a minibar, and a stunning view. The bathrooms are equipped with rain showers, bathtubs, and high-quality toiletries for a pampering experience.

name: Downtown Plaza Hotel
description: Downtown Plaza Hotel offers a comfortable and affordable Non-Deluxe Single Room ideal for solo travelers. This room features a single bed with clean linens, a small work desk, and complimentary Wi-Fi. Guests can enjoy a flat-screen TV and a nice view from the window. The en-suite bathroom includes a standard shower, fresh towels, and basic toiletries to ensure a pleasant stay.

name: Luxury Heights
description: Luxury Heights offers an opulent Presidential Suite Deluxe, providing the ultimate in luxury. This suite includes a spacious bedroom with a king-sized bed and premium linens, a separate living area with a sofa and flat-screen TV, and a dining table. Guests can enjoy high-speed internet, a minibar, and breathtaking views. The luxurious bathroom features a rain shower, a bathtub, plush towels, and high-quality toiletries.
address: 202 Park Street, Kolkata, West Bengal, 700016, India
